title: Langevin equation with potential of mean force: The case of anchored bath
summary: The potential of mean force (PMF) is an effective average potential acting on an open system, renormalized due to the interaction with the surrounding thermal bath. The PMF is defined for an equilibrium ensemble, and generally it is not clear how to use it when the system is out of equilibrium and described by a (generalized) Langevin equation. We study a model where the system is a single particle (so there are no complications related to internal forces) and a non-trivial PMF is due to the presence of on-site (anchor) potentials applied to the bath particles. We found that the PMF does not merely replace the external potential, but also makes the dissipation kernel and statistical properties of noise dependent on the system's position. That dependence is determined by the internal bath and system-bath interactions and is a priori unknown. Therefore, in the general case the Langevin equation with the PMF is not closed and thus inoperable. However, for systems with linear forces the aforementioned dependence on the system's position may be canceled. As an example, we consider a model where the bath is formed by the Klein-Gordon chain, i. e. a harmonic chain with on-site harmonic potentials. In that case, the generalized Langevin equation has the standard form with an external potential replaced by a quadratic PMF.

AI.tldr: 论文研究了在非平衡条件下如何将平衡系综定义的势能平均力（PMF）应用于广义朗之万方程，发现PMF不仅替代外部势能，还使耗散核和噪声统计性质依赖于系统位置，导致方程不封闭。但在线性力系统中，这种依赖性可被消除。
AI.motivation: PMF通常定义于平衡系综，但在非平衡条件下如何将其应用于广义朗之万方程尚不明确。本研究旨在探索PMF在非平衡系统中的作用机制，特别是当系统由广义朗之万方程描述时。
AI.method: 采用单粒子系统模型，避免内部力的复杂性，通过锚定势产生非平凡PMF。研究PMF对朗之万方程中外部势能、耗散核和噪声统计性质的影响，特别分析线性力系统的情况。
AI.result: 发现PMF不仅替代外部势能，还使耗散核和噪声统计性质依赖于系统位置，这种依赖性由内部浴和系统-浴相互作用决定且先验未知，导致朗之万方程不封闭。但在线性力系统中，这种依赖性可被消除，如克莱因-戈登链模型所示。
AI.conclusion: 一般情况下，带有PMF的朗之万方程因耗散核和噪声对系统位置的依赖性而不封闭且不可操作。但对于线性力系统，这种依赖性可被消除，使得PMF能有效替代外部势能，如谐波链模型所示。

title: Operator Lanczos Approach enabling Neural Quantum States as Real-Frequency Impurity Solvers
summary: To understand the intricate exchange between electrons of different bands in strongly correlated materials, it is essential to treat multi-orbital models accurately. For this purpose, dynamical mean-field theory (DMFT) provides an established framework, whose scope crucially hinges on the availability of efficient quantum impurity solvers. Here we present a real-frequency impurity solver based on neural quantum states (NQS) combined with an operator-Lanczos construction. NQS are an asymptotically unbiased variational ground-state ansatz that employs neural networks to capture long-range correlations on complicated graph structures. We leverage this ability to solve multi-orbital impurity problems using a systematically improvable Segmented Commutator Operator-Lanczos (SCOL) construction. Our benchmarks on both the single-orbital Anderson model and the multi-orbital Hubbard-Kanamori impurity Hamiltonian reveal excellent ground-state precision and the capacity to accurately resolve zero temperature spectral functions and self-energies. These results open avenues for extending DMFT to more challenging problems.

AI.tldr: 提出基于神经量子态（NQS）结合算子-Lanczos构造的实频杂质求解器，用于精确求解多轨道强关联材料模型
AI.motivation: 为了准确理解强关联材料中不同能带电子间的复杂交换，需要精确处理多轨道模型。DMFT为此提供了框架，但其应用范围关键取决于高效量子杂质求解器的可用性
AI.method: 采用神经量子态（NQS）作为无偏变分基态近似，结合分段对易算子-Lanczos（SCOL）构造，构建实频杂质求解器。NQS利用神经网络捕捉复杂图结构上的长程关联
AI.result: 在单轨道Anderson模型和多轨道Hubbard-Kanamori杂质哈密顿量上的基准测试显示，该方法具有优异的基态精度，能够准确解析零温谱函数和自能
AI.conclusion: 该方法为扩展DMFT到更具挑战性的问题开辟了新途径，提供了高效的多轨道杂质求解方案

title: Non-linear transport in multifold semimetals
summary: Transport measurements are a powerful way to probe the electronic structure of quantum materials, but the information they contain is often convoluted. Yet, in particular for simple low-energy fermiologies, and by combining linear and non-linear responses, definite conclusion can be drawn -- such as, for instance, in the case of the circular photogalvanic effect in Weyl semimetals. Here, we derive the complete DC intrinsic transport response functions up to third order in the applied electric field within Boltzmann theory that hold combined information about quantum geometry and band dispersion. We discuss the responses for multifold fermions at high-symmetry momenta in time-reversal symmetric crystals as well as their reduction by symmetry constraints. We exemplify in detail the cases of space group 213 and space group 199, which realize different multifold fermions, and show under which conditions these low-energy excitations can be differentially addressed through their bulk nonlinear responses, enabling nonlinear valley-tronics.

AI.tldr: 该论文推导了玻尔兹曼理论中高达三阶的完整直流本征输运响应函数，这些函数结合了量子几何和能带色散信息，并讨论了时间反演对称晶体中高对称动量处多重费米子的响应及其对称性约束，以空间群213和199为例展示了如何通过非线性响应区分这些低能激发。
AI.motivation: 输运测量是探测量子材料电子结构的强大工具，但其中包含的信息往往错综复杂。然而，对于简单的低能费米面结构，通过结合线性和非线性响应，可以得出明确的结论——例如在Weyl半金属的圆偏振光电流效应中。本文旨在推导完整的直流本征输运响应函数，以揭示量子几何和能带色散的综合信息。
AI.method: 在玻尔兹曼理论框架内，推导了高达三阶电场下的完整直流本征输运响应函数。讨论了时间反演对称晶体中高对称动量处多重费米子的响应，分析了对称性约束如何降低这些响应。以空间群213和空间群199为例进行详细分析，这两种空间群实现了不同类型的多重费米子。
AI.result: 推导出了包含量子几何和能带色散信息的完整三阶直流输运响应函数。展示了在特定条件下，可以通过体非线性响应来区分不同的低能激发，这为实现非线性谷电子学提供了可能性。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为通过非线性输运响应探测量子材料的电子结构提供了理论框架，特别是在多重费米子系统中，非线性响应能够区分不同的低能激发，为非线性谷电子学应用奠定了基础。

title: Dominant Excitonic Superconductivity in a Three-component Hubbard Chain
summary: Understanding superconductivity emerging from repulsive fermions remains a major challenge in condensed matter physics. In this paper, we investigate the pairing tendencies in a one-dimensional, three component repulsive Hubbard model, using the density matrix renormalization group method. At half-filling, the system exhibits density wave ground state due to strong Hubbard repulsions. Upon doping, we find that Cooper pairs can emerge, whose fluctuations predominate the long-range physics in the system across a wide parameter range. The effective attractions between Cooper pairs are mediated by the particle-hole fluctuations in the third non-pairing component, resembling an excitonic mechanism of superconductivity. The coexistence of multiple density waves and superconductivity at different fermion fillings is explored. We also present an analytical study of the pairing mechanism in both weak and strong coupling limits. Our results provide a new perspective for understanding and exploring unconventional superconductivities in strongly correlated fermionic systems.

AI.tldr: 研究一维三组分排斥哈伯德模型中的配对趋势，发现掺杂后库珀对可以通过第三非配对组分的粒子-空穴涨落介导有效吸引，类似于激子超导机制
AI.motivation: 理解排斥费米子系统中涌现的超导性一直是凝聚态物理的主要挑战，需要研究强关联费米系统中的非常规超导机制
AI.method: 使用密度矩阵重整化群方法研究一维三组分排斥哈伯德模型，并在弱耦合和强耦合极限下进行配对机制的解析研究
AI.result: 在半填充时系统呈现密度波基态，掺杂后库珀对涌现并在宽参数范围内主导长程物理，有效吸引由第三非配对组分的粒子-空穴涨落介导，探索了不同费米子填充下多种密度波与超导性的共存
AI.conclusion: 结果为理解和探索强关联费米系统中的非常规超导性提供了新视角，揭示了通过非配对组分介导的激子型超导机制

title: Diffusion and relaxation of topological excitations in layered spin liquids
summary: Relaxation processes in topological phases such as quantum spin liquids are controlled by the dynamics and interaction of fractionalized excitations. In layered materials hosting two-dimensional topological phases, elementary quasiparticles can diffuse freely within the layer, whereas only pairs (or more) can hop between layers - a fundamental consequence of topological order. Using exact solutions of emergent nonlinear diffusion equations and particle-based stochastic simulations, we explore how pump-probe experiments can provide unique signatures of the presence of $2d$ topological excitations in a $3d$ material. Here we show that the characteristic time scale of such experiments is inversely proportional to the initial excitation density, set by the pump intensity. A uniform excitation density created on the surface of a sample spreads subdiffusively into the bulk with a mean depth $\bar z$ scaling as $\sim t^{1/3}$ when annihilation processes are absent. The propagation becomes logarithmic, $\bar z \sim \log t$, when pair-annihilation is allowed. Furthermore, pair-diffusion between layers leads to a new decay law for the total density, $n(t) \sim (\log^2 t)/t$ - slower than in a purely $2d$ system. We discuss possible experimental implications for pump-probe experiments in samples of finite width.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究拓扑相（如量子自旋液体）中分数化激发的弛豫过程，通过非线性扩散方程和随机模拟，揭示了泵浦-探测实验如何识别二维拓扑激发在三维材料中的独特特征。
AI.motivation: 研究拓扑相中分数化激发的弛豫动力学，特别是二维拓扑激发在三维材料中的传播特性，旨在为实验探测拓扑序提供理论框架和可观测特征。
AI.method: 采用精确求解非线性扩散方程和基于粒子的随机模拟方法，分析泵浦-探测实验中激发的扩散行为，考虑层内自由扩散和层间配对跳跃的约束。
AI.result: 发现特征时间尺度与初始激发密度成反比；无湮灭时激发以亚扩散方式传播（平均深度∼t^{1/3}）；允许配对湮灭时变为对数传播（∼log t）；层间配对扩散导致总密度衰减规律为n(t)∼(log^2 t)/t，比纯二维系统更慢。
AI.conclusion: 泵浦-探测实验可提供二维拓扑激发在三维材料中的独特特征，包括亚扩散传播、对数时间尺度和特殊衰减规律，为实验探测拓扑序提供了理论预测和实验指导。

title: Ultrafast light-induced formation of a metastable hidden state in bismuth vanadate
summary: Bismuth vanadate (BiVO$_4$) is a key photocatalyst for solar fuel applications, yet fundamental questions remain regarding the nature of photogenerated polaronic states and the lattice dynamics that govern its light-to-chemical pathways. Here, we use femtosecond optical pump-X-ray probe measurements to track the photoinduced electronic and structural dynamics in BiVO$_4$ across multiple length and time scales. Transient X-ray absorption spectroscopy captures sub-picosecond electron localization within VO$_4$ tetrahedra, consistent with small polaron formation, whereas time-resolved X-ray diffraction reveals a slower, multi-picosecond lattice reorganization into a hidden photoexcited state that is structurally distinct from both the monoclinic ground state and the high-temperature tetragonal phase. Supported by density functional theory, we show that hole-lattice interactions dynamically reduce the ground state monoclinic distortion, stabilizing the hidden state. Our results demonstrate that electron- and hole-lattice coupling jointly shape the excited state landscape, with implications for carrier transport, interfacial energetics, and light-to-chemical energy conversion pathways.

AI.tldr: 通过飞秒光学泵浦-X射线探针技术，揭示了BiVO₄中光生载流子与晶格耦合的多尺度动力学过程，包括亚皮秒电子局域化和多皮秒晶格重组形成隐藏激发态。
AI.motivation: BiVO₄是太阳能燃料应用的关键光催化剂，但其光生极化子态的性质以及控制光化学转化路径的晶格动力学等基本问题仍未解决。
AI.method: 使用飞秒光学泵浦-X射线探针测量技术，结合瞬态X射线吸收光谱和时间分辨X射线衍射，在不同长度和时间尺度上跟踪BiVO₄的光诱导电子和结构动力学，并得到密度泛函理论的支持。
AI.result: 发现亚皮秒时间尺度内电子在VO₄四面体中局域化（小极化子形成），以及多皮秒时间尺度的晶格重组形成隐藏激发态。该状态在结构上既不同于单斜基态，也不同于高温四方相。空穴-晶格相互作用动态地减少了基态单斜畸变，稳定了隐藏态。
AI.conclusion: 电子-晶格和空穴-晶格耦合共同塑造了激发态景观，这对载流子传输、界面能量学和光化学能量转换路径具有重要意义。

title: Disentangling the unusual magnetic anisotropy of the near-room-temperature ferromagnet Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$
summary: In the quest for two-dimensional conducting materials with high ferromagnetic ordering temperature the new family of the layered Fe$_{n}$GeTe$_{2}$ compounds, especially the near-room-temperature ferromagnet Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$, receives a significant attention. Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$ features a peculiar spin reorientation transition at $T_\mathrm{SR} \sim 110$ K suggesting a non-trivial temperature evolution of the magnetic anisotropy (MA) - one of the main contributors to the stabilization of the magnetic order in the low-D systems. An electron spin resonance (ESR) spectroscopic study reported here provides quantitative insights into the unusual magnetic anisotropy of Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$. At high temperatures the total MA is mostly given by the demagnetization effect with a small contribution of the counteracting intrinsic magnetic anisotropy of an easy-axis type, whose growth below a characteristic temperature $T_{\rm shape} \sim 150$ K renders the sample seemingly isotropic at $T_\mathrm{SR}$. Below one further temperature $T_{\rm d} \sim 50$ K the intrinsic MA becomes even more complex. Importantly, all the characteristic temperatures found in the ESR experiment match those observed in transport measurements, suggesting an inherent coupling between magnetic and electronic degrees of freedom in Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$. This finding together with the observed signatures of the intrinsic two-dimensionality should facilitate optimization routes for the use of Fe$_{4}$GeTe$_{2}$ in the magneto-electronic devices, potentially even in the monolayer limit.

AI.tldr: 通过电子自旋共振(ESR)研究Fe₄GeTe₂的磁各向异性，揭示了其复杂的温度演化行为，发现磁各向异性与电子输运特性之间的内在耦合关系。
AI.motivation: Fe₄GeTe₂作为近室温铁磁二维材料备受关注，但其在T_SR~110K处的自旋重取向转变表明存在非平凡的磁各向异性温度演化，需要深入理解其磁各向异性特性。
AI.method: 采用电子自旋共振(ESR)光谱技术，定量研究Fe₄GeTe₂的磁各向异性随温度的变化，并与输运测量结果进行对比分析。
AI.result: 发现磁各向异性呈现复杂的三阶段温度演化：高温下以退磁效应为主，T_shape~150K以下本征易轴各向异性增强使样品在T_SR处看似各向同性，T_d~50K以下本征磁各向异性变得更加复杂。ESR特征温度与输运测量结果一致。
AI.conclusion: Fe₄GeTe₂中磁各向异性与电子自由度存在内在耦合，这一发现及其二维特性为优化其在磁电子器件（包括单层极限）中的应用提供了指导。

title: Halogen Chains with One-Dimensional Semi-Metallic Electronic Structure and Peierls Physics in Polymorphs of Na4X5 (X = I, Br, Cl) Compounds
summary: Since the pioneering works of Peierls, one-dimensional materials have attracted great attention. Still, the synthesis of truly monoatomic chains remains elusive. In this study, we explore a novel path of experimental synthesis of monoatomic one-dimensional chains by their chemical stabilization in ionic compounds. We demonstrate that in synthesized at high pressure sodium halides Na4X5 (X = I, Br, Cl) with hP18 Ga4Ti5-type structures, transfer of valence electrons from cations to anions leads to the formation of halogen chains connected with other atoms only by ionic interaction and having one-dimensional electronic structure. The Peierls physics in the systems is confirmed by theoretical calculations, newly synthesized incommensurately modulated i-hP18-Na4X5 (X = I, Br, Cl) compounds, as well as by the discovered hP36 phases of Na4Cl5 and Na4Br5.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过高压合成Na4X5卤化物，实现了真正单原子一维链的化学稳定化，验证了Peierls物理
AI.motivation: 一维材料自Peierls开创性工作以来备受关注，但真正单原子链的合成仍然困难。本研究探索通过离子化合物中的化学稳定化来实验合成单原子一维链的新途径。
AI.method: 采用高压合成钠卤化物Na4X5（X=I, Br, Cl），形成hP18 Ga4Ti5型结构。通过阳离子向阴离子转移价电子，形成仅通过离子相互作用与其他原子连接的卤素链，具有一维电子结构。通过理论计算、新合成的非公度调制i-hP18-Na4X5化合物以及发现的Na4Cl5和Na4Br5的hP36相来验证Peierls物理。
AI.result: 成功合成了具有一维电子结构的卤素单原子链，理论计算和新发现的相结构都证实了这些系统中的Peierls物理现象。
AI.conclusion: 通过高压合成钠卤化物中的化学稳定化方法，实现了真正单原子一维链的合成，为研究一维系统中的Peierls物理提供了新的实验平台。

title: Triangular $J_1$-$J_2$ Heisenberg Antiferromagnet in a Magnetic Field
summary: The behavior of the paradigmatic $J_1-J_2$ triangular lattice Heisenberg antiferromagnet in a magnetic field remains unsettled despite decades of study. We map out the phase diagram using three complementary approaches, including self-consistent nonlinear spin-wave theory, density-matrix renormalization group, and variational Monte Carlo. This combined analysis resolves the competition among different field-induced magnetic orders and magnetization plateaux across the classically frustrated parameter range. In particular, there is a finite range in the parameter regime around $J_2/J_1=\frac{1}{8}$ in which i) upon the application of the external field, the gapless quantum spin liquid acquires a finite density of monopoles, and ii) by further increasing the field, two plateaux are clearly obtained at $m=\frac{1}{3}$ and $m=\frac{1}{2}$. We discuss the experimental importance of the consecutive magnetization plateaux transitions as a signature of an underlying quantum spin-liquid phase.

AI.tldr: 该研究通过多种方法揭示了J1-J2三角晶格海森堡反铁磁体在磁场中的相图，发现特定参数范围内存在量子自旋液体相，并在磁场作用下出现m=1/3和m=1/2两个磁化平台。
AI.motivation: 尽管经过数十年研究，J1-J2三角晶格海森堡反铁磁体在磁场中的行为仍不清楚。该研究旨在通过多种互补方法系统地绘制其相图，解析不同场致磁序和磁化平台之间的竞争关系。
AI.method: 采用三种互补方法：自洽非线性自旋波理论、密度矩阵重整化群和变分蒙特卡洛方法。这些方法结合使用来研究经典受挫参数范围内的相图。
AI.result: 在J2/J1≈1/8参数范围内发现：1）外加磁场使无能隙量子自旋液体获得有限密度的单极子；2）进一步增加磁场时，清晰地出现m=1/3和m=1/2两个磁化平台。连续磁化平台转变可作为底层量子自旋液体相的实验特征。
AI.conclusion: 该研究通过多方法分析解决了J1-J2三角晶格海森堡反铁磁体在磁场中的相竞争问题，揭示了量子自旋液体相的存在证据，并指出连续磁化平台转变是该相的重要实验特征。

title: Structural and Thermal Stability of B4C/Ru Multilayers with Carbon Barrier Layers
summary: The chemical interaction between Mo and Ru layers in multilayer structures depending on the thickness ratio ($Γ$) was carried out using X-ray photoelectron spectroscopy (XPS), X-ray diffraction (XRD) and X-ray reflectometry (XRR). The results showed significant interaction of materials inside multilayer structures with the formation of ruthenium borides, with an increase in the B4C layer thickness (a decrease in the $Γ$ parameter) leading to the formation of ruthenium borides of different stoichiometry. The introduction of a carbon barrier layer at the Ru-on-B4C interface resulted in significant suppression of ruthenium boride formation. The thermal stability of the B4C/Ru system was also studied upon annealing at 400$^{\circ}$C for 1 hour before and after the introduction of the carbon barrier layer. It was shown that the introduction of a carbon barrier layer at the Ru-on-B4C interface increases the thermal stability of the system, which makes this system more suitable for use in optical systems exposed to long-term radiation. The obtained results are important for the development of highly efficient multilayer mirrors used in EUV lithography and X-ray optics.

AI.tldr: 研究Mo/Ru多层结构中化学相互作用，发现B4C层厚度变化影响硼化钌形成，碳阻挡层能抑制硼化钌形成并提高系统热稳定性
AI.motivation: 研究Mo/Ru多层结构中化学相互作用对材料性能的影响，为开发用于EUV光刻和X射线光学的高效多层反射镜提供基础
AI.method: 使用X射线光电子能谱(XPS)、X射线衍射(XRD)和X射线反射率(XRR)分析不同厚度比(Γ)下Mo/Ru多层结构的化学相互作用
AI.result: B4C层厚度增加(Γ参数减小)导致不同化学计量比的硼化钌形成；在Ru-on-B4C界面引入碳阻挡层显著抑制硼化钌形成；碳阻挡层提高系统在400°C退火1小时的热稳定性
AI.conclusion: 在Ru-on-B4C界面引入碳阻挡层能有效抑制硼化钌形成并提高热稳定性，使该系统更适合长期辐射暴露的光学系统应用，对EUV光刻和X射线光学多层反射镜开发具有重要意义

title: Disorder-mediated linear and nonlinear magnetotransport in the charge-density-wave material ${\rm Ta_2NiSe_7 }$
summary: We report disorder-mediated first-order linear and higher-order nonlinear (magneto-)transport of Ta$_2$NiSe$_7$ (TNS) in the charge-density-wave (CDW) regime. CDW transition temperature ($T_{CDW}$) and carrier density are proportional and inversely proportional to residual resistance ratio of samples, respectively. Such relation helps to understand the unique CDW order therein. High-$T_{CDW}$ TNS exhibits negative first-harmonic magnetoresistance (MR$^{1ω}$) under a magnetic field ($B$) parallel to the direction of alternating current ($I^ω$), which may arise from the anomalous velocity induced by the Berry curvature of three-dimensional topological bands near the Fermi level. As $T_{CDW}$ drops, a positive-to-negative MR$^{1ω}$ transition is observed with decreasing perpendicular $B$, which is likely due to the contribution of Zeeman effect on current pathways in the disordered system. Moreover, interestingly, the second-harmonic nonlinear signals are suppressed, while the third-harmonic signals are significant and sensitive to both $B$ and $T_{CDW}$. Such observations, together with scaling analysis, suggest the quantum geometry quadrupole at play and the modulation of disorder on third-order nonlinearity. Our results pave an avenue for tailoring distinct-order magnetoresistive phases in disordered topological materials.

AI.tldr: 该研究报道了Ta2NiSe7在电荷密度波(CDW)相中的无序介导线性与高阶非线性磁输运行为，揭示了CDW转变温度与载流子密度对无序度的依赖关系，以及Berry曲率和量子几何四极矩在非线性响应中的作用。
AI.motivation: 研究无序拓扑材料中的电荷密度波相变及其对线性与非线性磁输运的影响，探索量子几何效应在无序系统中的表现，为调控拓扑材料的输运性质提供新途径。
AI.method: 通过测量不同无序度（不同剩余电阻比）的Ta2NiSe7样品，在CDW相变温度附近进行线性与非线性磁输运测量，包括基频磁阻和高次谐波非线性信号，结合标度分析研究量子几何效应。
AI.result: 发现CDW转变温度与剩余电阻比成正比，载流子密度成反比；观察到负的基频磁阻可能源于费米面附近三维拓扑能带的Berry曲率；二次谐波信号被抑制而三次谐波信号显著，表明量子几何四极矩的作用；无序度调制了三次非线性响应。
AI.conclusion: 无序拓扑材料中的CDW相变与量子几何效应共同决定了线性与非线性磁输运行为，为调控不同阶次的磁阻相提供了新思路，揭示了无序系统在拓扑材料研究中的重要性。

title: Chiral-phonon generation of orbital currents in light transition metals
comment: main manuscript (17 pages, 5 figures) plus supplementary material (19 pages, 7 figures)
summary: Orbital angular momentum offers a new channel for information transport in a vast set of materials. Its coherent generation and detection remain, however, largely unexplored. Here, we demonstrate that chiral surface acoustic waves (SAWs) generate sizable orbital currents in light-metal/ferromagnet bilayers through both the acoustic orbital Hall effect and acoustic orbital pumping. Using symmetry analysis of SAW-driven voltages, we disentangle vorticity-sensitive orbital currents arising from lattice rotation in the non-magnetic layer from angular-momentum pumping from the ferromagnet. Strong signals are observed only in nickel/chromium and nickel/titanium, while nickel/aluminum and all cobalt-based bilayers show negligible responses, revealing the critical roles of orbital Hall conductivity, phonon-orbital coupling, and interfacial orbital transparency. Comparison with spin-torque ferromagnetic resonance and second-harmonic measurements -- where electrically driven orbital angular momentum are weaker -- demonstrates that phonon excitation generates orbital currents more efficiently. These results establish chiral SAWs as an effective route for orbitronic functionality and open pathways toward phonon-controlled orbital magnetism.

AI.tldr: 手性表面声波通过声学轨道霍尔效应和声学轨道泵浦在轻金属/铁磁体双层结构中产生显著轨道电流，为轨道电子学功能提供了有效途径。
AI.motivation: 轨道角动量为材料中的信息传输提供了新通道，但其相干生成和检测方法仍未被充分探索。本研究旨在探索手性表面声波作为生成轨道电流的有效途径。
AI.method: 使用手性表面声波在轻金属/铁磁体双层结构中激发轨道电流，通过对称性分析分离声波驱动电压中的不同贡献，比较不同材料组合（镍/铬、镍/钛、镍/铝、钴基双层）的响应。
AI.result: 仅在镍/铬和镍/钛双层中观察到强信号，而镍/铝和所有钴基双层显示可忽略的响应，揭示了轨道霍尔电导率、声子-轨道耦合和界面轨道透明度的关键作用。声子激发比电驱动方法更有效地生成轨道电流。
AI.conclusion: 手性表面声波是轨道电子学功能的有效途径，为声子控制的轨道磁性开辟了新路径，证明了声子激发在生成轨道电流方面比传统电驱动方法更高效。

title: Molybdenum Disulfide Bilayers Hybridized with Reduced Graphene Oxide Nanosheets for Enhanced Hydrogen Evolution Reaction
comment: Bruno Ferreira Brischi, Gabriela Frajtag, João Pedro da Silva Mariano, and Laís Fernanda Medeiros Ruela contributed equally to this work
summary: Two-dimensional (2D) molybdenum disulfide (MoS2) nanosheets have attracted attention as a promising and cost-effective alternative catalyst for the hydrogen evolution reaction (HER). However, their aggregation and poor conductivity limit their catalytic activity. Consequently, researchers are exploring ways to improve the conductivity and density of electroactive edges of MoS2 through hybridization with akin advanced 2D materials. Here, reduced graphene oxide (rGO) nanosheets are added to a liquid-phase-exfoliated MoS2 dispersion to create drop-casting hybrid MoS2@rGO electrodes for HER. The findings reveal the formation of ~1.1 nm-thick MoS2 bilayers, with the catalytic performance of MoS2@rGO dependent on the degree of graphene oxide reduction. The rGO moderate reduction prevents the MoS2 bilayers from restacking, improves conductivity, retains oxygenated groups that enhance interlayer spacing, and exposes more electroactive edges. When hybridized with rGO crafted at optimal reduction time, the hybrid system eclipses the efficiency of pristine MoS2 bilayers by attaining the lowest overpotential (~70 mV) and the lowest Tafel slope (~46 mV dec-1). This shows that MoS2 bilayers hybridized with rGO offer a promising method to outperform the electrocatalytic efficiency of MoS2-based electrodes. These findings expand opportunities for future strain engineering, defect engineering, and high-end twist-angle assemblies for hybrid systems combining MoS2 bilayers and rGO.

AI.tldr: MoS2双层与rGO杂化显著提升HER催化性能，通过优化rGO还原程度防止MoS2堆叠、提高导电性并暴露更多电活性边缘
AI.motivation: MoS2纳米片作为HER催化剂成本效益高，但存在聚集和导电性差的问题，需要通过与先进二维材料杂化来改善其导电性和电活性边缘密度
AI.method: 将rGO纳米片添加到液相剥离的MoS2分散液中，制备滴铸杂化MoS2@rGO电极，通过控制rGO还原程度优化杂化系统
AI.result: rGO适度还原能防止MoS2双层重堆叠，提高导电性，保留含氧基团增加层间距，暴露更多电活性边缘，在最佳还原时间下获得最低过电位(~70 mV)和最低Tafel斜率(~46 mV dec-1)
AI.conclusion: MoS2双层与rGO杂化为提高MoS2基电极电催化效率提供了有前景的方法，为未来应变工程、缺陷工程和高阶扭曲角组装等杂化系统研究开辟了新机会

title: The unexpected dewetting during growth of silicene flakes with dendritic pyramids
summary: Silicene growth on graphene has emerged as a novel method for fabricating silicon-based van der Waals heterostructures. However, the silicene flakes produced in this manner are the result of an exotic growth mode characterized by metastable nanostructures with varying degrees of deviation from equilibrium, with large two-dimensional flakes surrounded by a rim that coexist with small 3D islands, and, at large deposits, thick dendritic pyramids separated by a denuded zone. In order to rationalize and control this growth, a model is derived that revisits the dewetting thermodynamics and considers generally ignored adsorption and step-edge energies. The model is investigated using kinetic Monte-Carlo simulations and mean-field rate equations, and implemented by close inspection of microscopy images. This model perfectly reproduces the experimental outcomes, unveiling an anomalous growth mode, and provides guidelines on experimental conditions for high-quality silicene growth.

AI.tldr: 本文提出模型解释石墨烯上硅烯的异常生长模式，结合热力学、动力学模拟和实验观察，为高质量硅烯生长提供指导。
AI.motivation: 石墨烯上生长的硅烯呈现异常的生长模式，包括亚稳态纳米结构、二维薄片与三维小岛共存、以及大沉积时的枝晶金字塔等复杂现象，需要理论模型来解释和控制这种生长过程。
AI.method: 建立了一个重新审视去湿热力学并考虑通常被忽略的吸附能和台阶边缘能的模型，通过动力学蒙特卡洛模拟和平均场速率方程进行研究，并结合显微镜图像进行验证。
AI.result: 该模型完美再现了实验结果，揭示了硅烯的异常生长模式，并为高质量硅烯生长提供了实验条件指导。
AI.conclusion: 通过综合考虑去湿热力学、吸附能和台阶边缘能，建立的模型成功解释了石墨烯上硅烯的复杂生长行为，为控制硅烯生长质量提供了理论依据。

title: Modeling the Effects of Slip, Twinning, and Notch on the Deformation of Single-Crystal Austenitic Manganese Steel
comment: The article contains 38 pages and 19 figures
summary: The objective of this work is to deconvolute the interaction of slip, twinning, and notch on the deformation response of an austenitic manganese (Hadfield) steel using detailed finite element simulations. The simulations employ a rate-dependent crystal plasticity constitutive model that incorporates both slip and twinning deformation mechanisms. The model accounts for the spatially non-uniform appearance of new twin-related orientations, hardening due to slip--twin interactions, and modified properties of the twinned crystal. Limited experiments on single-crystal dog-bone and single-edge notch specimens, with two crystal orientations, are also conducted to aid the simulation. Several features of the experimental observations are accurately captured in the simulations. For example, simulations accurately capture distinct stress--strain responses associated with different crystallographic orientations, including variations in initial hardening behavior followed by either decreasing or increasing hardening depending on the dominant deformation mechanisms. The simulation also captures the observed orientation-dependent asymmetric deformation of the notch in single-edge notch specimens. Additionally, by selectively activating deformation mechanisms, the role of twinning is isolated and its influence on both global and local response is clearly demonstrated. These results provide a mechanistic understanding of how deformation mode interactions and local geometry (i.e., notch) influence the response of these materials.

AI.tldr: 使用包含滑移和孪生机制的晶体塑性模型，通过有限元模拟研究Hadfield钢中滑移、孪生和缺口对变形响应的相互作用，并通过实验验证模拟结果。
AI.motivation: 研究Hadfield钢中滑移、孪生和缺口几何形状之间的复杂相互作用，这些因素共同影响材料的变形响应，需要深入理解其机理。
AI.method: 采用速率相关的晶体塑性本构模型进行有限元模拟，模型包含滑移和孪生变形机制，考虑新孪晶取向的空间非均匀分布、滑移-孪生相互作用的硬化效应以及孪晶的改性性质。同时进行单晶狗骨试样和单边缺口试样的有限实验验证。

AI.conclusion: 该研究提供了对Hadfield钢中变形模式相互作用和局部几何形状（如缺口）如何影响材料响应的机理理解，为材料设计和性能预测提供了理论基础。

title: Synthesis, Growth Mechanism, and Photocatalytic Properties of Metallic-Bi/Bi13S18Br2 Nano-Bell Heterostructures
summary: We report the synthesis of bell-shaped Bi/Bi13S18Br2 metal/semiconductor heterostructures as a photocatalyst based on non-toxic and Earth-abundant elements. Their unique morphology arises from a multi-step growth process, involving 1) the nucleation of Bi13S18Br2 nanorods, 2) the reduction of a metallic-Bi domain on their surface induced by N,N-didodecylmethylamine, and 3) the heterostructure accretion by a localized reaction at the Bi/Bi13S18Br2 interface promoted by Ostwald ripening. These heterostructures display remarkable stability in polar solvents, remaining almost unaffected by prolonged exposure to isopropanol and water, and exhibit high photocatalytic efficiency for the degradation of organic dyes (i.e., Rhodamine-B and Methylene Blue) under visible-light irradiation, with good recyclability. Additionally, preliminary tests demonstrate CO2 reduction capabilities, which make them promising for both the photocatalytic degradation of pollutants and photo-electro CO2 conversion. The straightforward synthesis process and the use of non-toxic and earth-abundant elements offers significant potential for sustainable energy conversion technologies.

AI.tldr: 合成了钟形Bi/Bi13S18Br2金属/半导体异质结构光催化剂，具有优异的光催化降解有机染料性能和CO2还原潜力
AI.motivation: 开发基于无毒、地球丰富元素的高效光催化剂，用于污染物降解和CO2还原等可持续能源转换技术
AI.method: 多步生长法：1) Bi13S18Br2纳米棒成核；2) N,N-二甲基十二胺诱导在表面还原金属Bi域；3) 通过奥斯特瓦尔德熟化促进Bi/Bi13S18Br2界面局部反应实现异质结构生长
AI.result: 异质结构在极性溶剂中稳定性优异，对罗丹明B和亚甲基蓝等有机染料在可见光下具有高效光催化降解性能，且可循环使用，初步测试显示具有CO2还原能力

title: Benchmarking First-Principles Approaches for Extracting Magnetic Exchange Interactions
summary: Magnetic exchange interactions govern the macroscopic magnetic behavior of solids and underpin both fundamental spin phenomena and emerging technologies. The accurate and efficient determination of these interactions is therefore critical for predictive modeling of magnetic materials. Here we present a systematic first-principles comparison of three widely used approaches-the Least-Squares Total Energy (LSTE), the Four-State Total Energy (FSTE), and the Green's function-based Liechtenstein \textit{et al.} (LKAG) methods-applied to thirteen antiferromagnetic compounds. We introduce an framework for identifying the minimal supercells required for an accurate exchange parameter extraction in the FSTE method, significantly reducing computational cost while preserving precision. Our results show that LSTE and FSTE yield nearly identical exchange parameters, whereas the LKAG method reproduces the dominant exchange interactions but exhibits quantitative deviations. A detailed analysis of computational efficiency versus accuracy reveals that the LSTE scheme offers the most favorable balance, establishing a general, reproducible, and scalable workflow for Heisenberg mapping, while the FSTE approach remains the most straightforward for extracting specific exchange interactions.

AI.tldr: 系统比较三种磁性交换相互作用计算方法（LSTE、FSTE、LKAG），提出FSTE最小超胞框架，发现LSTE在效率与精度间最佳平衡
AI.motivation: 磁性交换相互作用对固体宏观磁行为和新兴技术至关重要，需要准确高效的计算方法进行预测性建模
AI.method: 系统比较三种第一性原理方法：最小二乘总能量法（LSTE）、四态总能量法（FSTE）和基于格林函数的Liechtenstein方法（LKAG），应用于13种反铁磁化合物，为FSTE方法提出识别最小超胞的框架
AI.result: LSTE和FSTE得到几乎相同的交换参数，LKAG能重现主要交换相互作用但存在定量偏差；LSTE方案在计算效率与精度间提供最佳平衡，FSTE方法对提取特定交换相互作用最直接
AI.conclusion: 建立了通用、可重复、可扩展的海森堡映射工作流程，LSTE提供最佳平衡，FSTE适合提取特定相互作用，最小超胞框架显著降低计算成本

title: Core@Shell AgBr@CsPbBr3 Nanocrystals as Precursors to Hollow Lead Halide Perovskite Nanocubes
summary: We report the synthesis of colloidal core@shell AgBr@CsPbBr3 nanocubes by a one-pot approach, where the nucleation and growth of AgBr nanocrystals occurs rapidly after the injection of chemical precursors. This is immediately followed by the overgrowth of CsPbBr3, delivering AgBr@CsPbBr3 nanocubes of several tens of nanometers in size, with the volume of the AgBr core being only a small fraction of the overall nanocrystal volume. The formation of a core@shell geometry is facilitated by the epitaxial compatibility between AgBr and CsPbBr3 along multiple crystallographic directions. Exchange with Cl-ions leads to Ag@CsPbCl3 nanocubes, whereas exchange with I-ions leads to hollow CsPbI3 nanocubes, due to selective etching of the AgBr (or Ag) core region by the I-ions diffusing in the nanocubes. These hollow CsPbI3 nanocubes can then be converted into hollow CsPbBr3 and CsPbCl3 nanocubes by halide exchange. The optical emission properties of the hollow CsPbX3 (X=Cl, Br, I) nanocubes are in line with those expected from large, non-hollow halide perovskite nanocrystals, indicating that the small hollow region in the cubes has no major influence on their optical properties.

AI.tldr: 通过一锅法合成AgBr@CsPbBr3核壳纳米立方体，利用卤素交换可制备空心CsPbX3纳米立方体，其光学性质与实心纳米晶相似。
AI.motivation: 开发一种简便方法合成钙钛矿核壳纳米结构，探索其结构调控和卤素交换反应，研究空心结构对光学性质的影响。
AI.method: 采用一锅法合成AgBr@CsPbBr3核壳纳米立方体，通过卤素交换反应（Cl⁻和I⁻）调控结构，I⁻离子可选择性刻蚀AgBr核形成空心结构。
AI.result: 成功合成数十纳米尺寸的AgBr@CsPbBr3核壳纳米立方体，通过卤素交换获得Ag@CsPbCl3和空心CsPbI3纳米立方体，空心结构对光学性质无显著影响。
AI.conclusion: 该方法可有效合成钙钛矿核壳和空心纳米结构，为钙钛矿纳米材料的结构调控和光学应用提供了新途径。

title: Exogenous Metal Cations in the Synthesis of CsPbBr3 Nanocrystals and their Interplay with Tertiary Amines
summary: Current syntheses of CsPbBr3 halide perovskite nanocrystals (NCs) rely on over-stoichiometric amounts of Pb2+ precursors, resulting in unreacted lead ions at the end of the process. In our synthesis scheme of CsPbBr3 NCs we replaced excess Pb2+ with different exogenous metal cations (M) and investigated their effect on the synthesis products. These cations can be divided into two groups: group 1 delivers monodisperse CsPbBr3 cubes capped with oleate species (as for the case when Pb2+ is used in excess) and with photoluminescence quantum yield (PLQY) as high as 90% with some cations (for example with M= In3+); group 2 yields irregularly shaped CsPbBr3 NCs with broad size distributions. In both cases, the addition of a tertiary ammonium cation (didodecylmethyl ammonium, DDMA+) during the synthesis, after the nucleation of the NCs, reshapes the NCs to monodisperse truncated cubes. Such NCs feature a mixed oleate/DDMA+ surface termination with PLQY values up to 90%. For group 1 cations, this happens only if the ammonium cation is directly added as a salt (DDMA-Br) while for group 2 cations this happens even if the corresponding tertiary amine (DDMA) is added, instead of DDMA-Br. This is attributed to the fact that only group 2 cations can facilitate the protonation of DDMA by the excess oleic acid present in the reaction environment. In all cases studied, the incorporation of M cations is marginal and the reshaping of the NCs is only transient: if the reactions are run for a long time the truncated cubes evolve to cubes.

AI.tldr: 研究开发了一种合成CsPbBr3钙钛矿纳米晶的新方法，用外源金属阳离子替代过量Pb2+，并结合DDMA+表面修饰，可获得高单分散性、高发光效率的纳米晶。
AI.motivation: 传统CsPbBr3纳米晶合成需要过量Pb2+前驱体，导致未反应的铅离子残留。本研究旨在开发更环保、高效的合成方法，减少铅用量并改善纳米晶性能。
AI.method: 用不同外源金属阳离子（M）替代过量Pb2+合成CsPbBr3纳米晶，并在成核后添加叔铵阳离子（DDMA+）进行表面修饰。根据金属阳离子特性分为两组：第一组可直接形成单分散立方体；第二组形成不规则形状，需DDMA+辅助整形。
AI.result: 第一组金属阳离子可获得单分散CsPbBr3立方体，PLQY高达90%（如In3+）；第二组金属阳离子经DDMA+修饰后可形成单分散截角立方体，PLQY同样可达90%。金属阳离子掺入量极少，纳米晶形貌变化是暂时的，长时间反应会恢复为立方体。
AI.conclusion: 通过外源金属阳离子替代过量Pb2+并结合DDMA+表面修饰，可合成高单分散性、高发光效率的CsPbBr3纳米晶，为减少铅用量、优化钙钛矿纳米晶合成提供了新策略。

title: MBE obtained n-CdO:Eu p-Si heterojunctions -- electron beam induced profiling, electrical and structural properties
summary: The present investigation reports on the fabrication and characterization of heterojunctions based on in situ Eu doped CdO layers, which were deposited on p-type silicon using the plasma assisted molecular beam epitaxy (PA MBE) method. The structural and optical properties of the cadmium oxide (CdO) films were investigated using X ray diffraction and Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR). The CdO Eu films are polycrystalline. The electrical properties of the p n heterojunction composed of transparent n CdO Eu and p Si semiconductors were investigated by current voltage and electron beam-induced current (EBIC) measurements. Current voltage measurements demonstrate good junction characteristics with a rectifying ratio of 20 . EBIC measurements allowed us to calculate the diffusion length of minority carriers and the precise location of the depleted area at the CdO and Si interfaces.

AI.tldr: 制备并表征了基于原位Eu掺杂CdO层/p型硅的异质结，研究了其结构、光学和电学性能，展示了良好的整流特性并确定了耗尽区位置。
AI.motivation: 研究Eu掺杂CdO薄膜与p型硅形成的异质结的性能，探索其在光电器件中的应用潜力，特别是透明导电氧化物与硅基半导体的界面特性。
AI.method: 采用等离子体辅助分子束外延(PA MBE)方法在p型硅上沉积原位Eu掺杂CdO层，通过X射线衍射和傅里叶变换红外光谱(FTIR)分析结构光学性质，利用电流-电压和电子束诱导电流(EBIC)测量研究电学特性。
AI.result: CdO-Eu薄膜为多晶结构，n-CdO-Eu/p-Si异质结表现出良好的整流特性（整流比20），EBIC测量成功计算出少数载流子扩散长度并精确定位了CdO/Si界面的耗尽区位置。
AI.conclusion: 成功制备了具有良好整流特性的Eu掺杂CdO/Si异质结，EBIC技术有效表征了界面耗尽区，为基于透明导电氧化物/硅异质结的光电器件开发提供了重要参考。

title: Observation of Raman anomaly and characterization of magnetic phases in van der Waals ferromagnet Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$
summary: Two-dimensional (2D) van der Waals (vdW) ferromagnet Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ has garnered significant interest due to its high Curie temperature (T$_C$), large saturation magnetization, and complex magnetic behavior arising, in part, from multiple inequivalent iron sites and vacancies. While several aspects of its complex magnetic and structural characteristics have been examined through careful experiments and first principles studies, much of it remains debatable. In this study, we present one of the first comprehensive temperature-dependent Raman spectrum for bulk Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ and in the process reveal an interesting peak shift anomaly at 150 K. We discuss the possible relationship of this Raman anomaly with the anomalous lattice expansion reported earlier for this material at around 110 K. The impact of the anomalous lattice expansion on the magnetic anisotropy in this van der Waals material is also revealed by an isothermal magnetization analysis. These findings will prove crucial for the use of Fe$_5$GeTe$_2$ in high-performance spintronic devices.

AI.tldr: Fe₅GeTe₂二维范德华铁磁体的拉曼光谱研究揭示了150K处的异常峰移，与之前报道的110K晶格异常膨胀相关，并影响了磁各向异性。
AI.motivation: Fe₅GeTe₂作为二维范德华铁磁体具有高居里温度、大饱和磁化强度和复杂磁性行为，但其磁性和结构特性仍存在争议，需要更深入的研究来理解其物理机制。
AI.method: 研究采用温度依赖的拉曼光谱测量Fe₅GeTe₂块体材料，并分析150K处的异常峰移现象。同时结合等温磁化分析来研究晶格异常膨胀对磁各向异性的影响。
AI.result: 首次获得了Fe₅GeTe₂块体材料的全面温度依赖拉曼光谱，发现了150K处的异常峰移现象。该异常与之前报道的110K晶格异常膨胀相关，并且等温磁化分析揭示了这种晶格膨胀对材料磁各向异性的影响。
AI.conclusion: Fe₅GeTe₂在150K处的拉曼异常峰移与晶格异常膨胀相关，这种结构变化影响了材料的磁各向异性。这些发现对于理解该材料的复杂磁性行为及其在高性能自旋电子器件中的应用至关重要。

title: Engineering Topological Bands in Strained Covalent Organic Frameworks
summary: The tunability of covalent organic frameworks (COFs) opens opportunities to engineer topological electronic phases, including topological insulators (TIs) and higher-order topological insulators (HOTIs)--materials that host in-gap states localized at their edges, hinges, or corners. Here we explore how chemically feasible perturbations can drive triazine-based COFs (CTFs) into topological regimes. Using a tight-binding model on the Honeycomb lattice inspired by the frontier electronic states of CTFs, we show that introducing an effective uniaxial strain--implemented as a modulation of electron hopping on a subset of bonds--can generate a series of distinct topological band structures. This effect can be realized in practice through chemical substitution of linkers along the strained bonds. First-principles calculations demonstrate that replacing biphenyl with pyrene linkers drives a CTF to the brink of a HOTI phase, suggesting a viable route toward topological band-structure engineering in COFs.

AI.tldr: 通过化学修饰实现共价有机框架（COFs）的拓扑电子相调控，特别是高阶拓扑绝缘体（HOTIs）
AI.motivation: 共价有机框架（COFs）的可调性为设计拓扑电子相（包括拓扑绝缘体和高阶拓扑绝缘体）提供了机会，这些材料在边缘、铰链或角落处具有局域带隙态。研究如何通过化学可行的扰动将三嗪基COFs驱动到拓扑相区域。
AI.method: 1. 使用受CTFs前沿电子态启发的蜂窝晶格紧束缚模型；2. 引入有效单轴应变（通过对特定键的电子跳跃进行调制）；3. 通过化学取代应变键上的连接体实现实际应用；4. 第一性原理计算验证用芘连接体取代联苯连接体
AI.result: 1. 有效单轴应变可以产生一系列不同的拓扑能带结构；2. 用芘连接体取代联苯连接体可以将CTF驱动到高阶拓扑绝缘体相的边缘；3. 证明了在COFs中实现拓扑能带结构工程的可行途径
AI.conclusion: 化学修饰（如连接体取代）是实现共价有机框架拓扑相调控的有效策略，为在COFs中设计拓扑电子材料提供了实用途径，特别是通过化学取代应变键上的连接体可以驱动材料进入高阶拓扑绝缘体相。

title: Computational Screening and Discovery of Silver-Indium Halide Double Salts
summary: Perovskite-inspired materials have emerged as promising candidates for both outdoor and indoor photovoltaic applications owing to their favorable optoelectronic properties and reduced toxicity. Here, we employ the experimentally realized AgBiI$_4$ double salt as a structural prototype and replace Bi$^{3+}$ with In$^{3+}$ to design a novel lead-free halide compound, AgInI$_4$. First-principles calculations predict that AgInI$_4$ is both chemically and dynamically stable, exhibiting a direct band gap of 1.72 eV, comparable to its bismuth analogue. However, its predicted photovoltaic performance, evaluated using the spectroscopic limited maximum efficiency metric, is lower under both solar and LED illumination. This reduction arises primarily from symmetry-forbidden optical transitions and the absence of Bi-derived 6s$^2$ lone-pair states at the valence band maximum. High-throughput screening of the Ag-In-I ternary phase-space reveals several more stable and metastable compounds that fall into two structural families: tetrahedrally and octahedrally coordinated, with characteristic band gaps near 3.0 eV and 2.0 eV, respectively. Despite multiple synthetic attempts, the predicted AgInI$_4$ phase could not be experimentally realized, underscoring the challenges of stabilizing indium-based halide double salts. While these materials are unlikely to serve as efficient photovoltaic absorbers, their tunable band gaps and stability make them promising candidates for charge transport and other optoelectronic applications.

AI.tldr: 通过第一性原理计算设计了一种新型无铅卤化物AgInI₄，预测其具有1.72 eV直接带隙，但光伏性能低于铋类似物，实验未能合成该相，但发现Ag-In-I体系材料在电荷传输等应用中有潜力。
AI.motivation: 开发无铅钙钛矿类材料用于光伏应用，通过用In³⁺替代Bi³⁺设计新型AgInI₄化合物，探索其在室内外光伏中的潜力。
AI.method: 以实验验证的AgBiI₄为结构原型，用第一性原理计算设计AgInI₄，评估其化学和动力学稳定性、带隙特性，使用光谱限制最大效率指标评估光伏性能，并对Ag-In-I三元相空间进行高通量筛选。
AI.result: 计算预测AgInI₄具有1.72 eV直接带隙且稳定，但光伏性能低于铋类似物，主要由于对称性禁阻光学跃迁和缺乏Bi的6s²孤对电子态。高通量筛选发现两类结构家族（四面体和八面体配位），带隙分别为~3.0 eV和~2.0 eV。实验未能合成预测的AgInI₄相。
AI.conclusion: AgInI₄虽不适合高效光伏吸收层，但其可调带隙和稳定性使其在电荷传输和其他光电子应用中具有潜力，同时凸显了稳定铟基卤化物双盐的挑战。

title: An accurate alternative to hybrid functionals for germanium: DFT+$α$
summary: The accuracy of bulk property predictions in density functional theory (DFT) calculations depends on the choice of exchange-correlation functional. While the Perdew-Burke-Ernzerhof (PBE) functional systematically overestimates lattice parameters and strongly underestimates electronic band gaps, hybrid functionals such as Heyd-Scuseria-Ernzerhof (HSE) offer better overall agreement across a broad range of materials. Using germanium as a critical test case, we challenge the ability of both functionals to capture semiconductor properties. Although HSE improves PBE's gap error, it fails to reproduce germanium's correct $Γ$-L indirect and $Γ$-$Γ$ band gaps simultaneously. Noting that the PBE underestimated energy separation between the 4p valence-band maximum and 4s conduction-band minimum causes unphysical $sp$ mixing, we propose DFT+$α$, a semi-empirical correction scheme applied selectively to 4s-like orbitals. For germanium, DFT+$α$ restores the proper ordering and orbital character of the band edges and yields accurate lattice constant, bulk modulus, elastic constants and phonon frequencies at a fraction of hybrid-functional computational cost.

AI.tldr: 提出DFT+α半经验修正方案，通过选择性修正4s轨道来解决PBE和HSE泛函在锗半导体性质预测中的缺陷，以较低计算成本获得准确的能带结构、晶格常数和弹性性质。
AI.motivation: 传统DFT泛函在预测半导体性质时存在系统误差：PBE泛函高估晶格常数、严重低估带隙；HSE杂化泛函虽有所改进，但仍无法同时准确预测锗的间接带隙和直接带隙。这些误差源于PBE对4p价带顶和4s导带底能量分离的低估，导致非物理的sp混合。
AI.method: 提出DFT+α半经验修正方案，选择性地对4s类轨道施加修正。该方法通过调整4s轨道的能量位置，恢复能带边缘的正确排序和轨道特征，同时保持较低的计算成本。
AI.result: DFT+α成功恢复了锗能带边缘的正确排序和轨道特征，同时准确预测了晶格常数、体模量、弹性常数和声子频率，计算成本远低于杂化泛函方法。
AI.conclusion: DFT+α提供了一种高效准确的半经验修正方案，解决了传统泛函在锗半导体性质预测中的关键缺陷，为半导体材料的DFT计算提供了有前景的替代方法。

title: Low Resistance Non-Alloyed Ohmic Contacts to High Al Composition n-type AlGaN
summary: Ohmic contacts to high (>70\%) Al content n-type Al$_x$Ga$_{1-x}$N ultra-wide bandgap semiconductor layers in nitride electronic and photonic devices are typically fabricated by a lift-off process and high temperature ($>700^\circ$C) thermal alloying. These conditions often result in significant structural deformations of the fabricated structures and impose a harsh thermal budget on all other aspects of the device. Here, we report the fabrication of \textit{non-alloyed} \textit{as-deposited} ohmic contacts to 71\% n+AlGaN ($E_\text{g}\sim5.4$~eV) with a free carrier concentration of roughly $7\times 10^{19}$~cm$^{-3}$ and a resistivity of 4 - 5.5 m$Ω$cm (among the lowest reported for Al$_{0.71}$Ga$_{0.29}$N) with linear $I-V$ characteristics and a contact resistivity of $ρ_\text{c}=(4.4\pm1.0)\times10^{-4}$~$Ω$cm$^2$ (measured at zero voltage). Contacts with this quality are formed by two separate fabrication schemes: (i) metal-first patterning, and (ii) lift-off with an oxygen asher descum prior to metal deposition. Given the low threading dislocation density in the single-crystal AlN substrate used for epitaxy, the smooth morphology of the contacted epitaxial surface, and the non-alloyed nature of the contacts, this contact resistivity is attributed purely to thermionic field emission through the metal-semiconductor junction. Contact resistivity extraction at low current injection enables us to model these results using a thermionic field-emission model of contact resistivity, yielding a barrier height for Ti/Al$_{0.71}$Ga$_{0.29}$N of $(0.81\pm0.02)$ eV.

AI.tldr: 开发了非合金化、沉积即用的欧姆接触技术，用于高铝含量n型AlGaN超宽带隙半导体，避免了传统高温合金化工艺带来的结构变形和热预算问题。
AI.motivation: 传统的高铝含量n型AlGaN欧姆接触需要高温（>700°C）合金化工艺，这会导致结构变形并施加苛刻的热预算限制，限制了器件性能和应用。
AI.method: 采用两种非合金化沉积方案：(1)金属优先图案化；(2)剥离工艺结合氧等离子体去胶处理。使用Ti/Al金属接触层，在71% Al含量的n+AlGaN上实现沉积即用的欧姆接触。

title: A Unified Symmetry Classification of Magnetic Orders via Spin Space Groups: Prediction of Coplanar Even-Wave Phases
summary: Spin space groups (SSGs) impose fundamentally different constraints on magnetic configurations in real and reciprocal spaces. As a consequence, the correspondence between real-space and momentum-space spin arrangements is far richer than traditionally assumed. Building on the complete enumeration of SSGs, we develop a systematic, symmetry-based framework that classifies all possible spin arrangements allowed by these groups. This unified approach naturally incorporates conventional magnetic orders, altermagnetism, and p-wave magnetism as distinct symmetry classes. Crucially, our classification predicts a variety of novel magnetic phases, highlighted by the discovery of the coplanar even-wave magnet: a state that is non-collinear in real space but hosts a collinear even-wave spin polarization in k-space. Analysis of a minimal model reveals that this phase is characterized by non-quantized spin polarization and exhibits a novel mechanism for symmetry-enforced zero polarization on non-degenerate bands. Extending the framework from bulk crystals to layer SSGs appropriate for two-dimensional systems, we further predict layered counterparts and provide symmetry guidelines for designing bilayer coplanar p-wave and even-wave magnets. We further validate this finding through first-principles calculations and propose CoCrO4 as a promising candidate for its experimental realization, thereby demonstrating the completeness and predictive power of the SSG-based classification of magnetic orders.
